title: Old-Fashioned Homemade Jam Making Part 1
description: Learn how to make old-fashioned traditional jam at home without store bought pecting. Tips for natural pectin sources and safety on using older recipes.
content:encoded: Learn how to make old-fashioned traditional jam at home without store bought pecting. Tips for natural pectin sources and safety on using older recipes.
itunes:subtitle: No store bought pectin tips
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
